title: Retro Comic Books
description: Golden and Silver Age comic books and superheroes

questions.question: In what year did Superman first appear in Action Comics #1?
Who created Batman, the Dark Knight detective who debuted in 1939?
Which patriotic superhero was created by Joe Simon and Jack Kirby in 1941?
What was the name of Superman's home planet?
Which comic book publisher introduced the Fantastic Four, Spider-Man, and the X-Men in the early 1960s?
What was Wonder Woman's civilian identity in the Golden Age comics?
Which Archie Comics character was known for his love of hamburgers?
What type of radiation gave the Incredible Hulk his powers in his 1962 debut?
The 'Comics Code Authority' seal of approval was introduced in what decade to regulate comic content?
Which Golden Age superhero was known as the 'Fastest Man Alive'?
What classic comic strip character, created by Chester Gould, was a square-jawed detective?
In the Silver Age, what teenager was bitten by a radioactive spider?
What was the original price of most comic books during the Golden Age in the 1940s?
Which company published 'Tales from the Crypt' and other horror comics before the Comics Code?
What magic word did young Billy Batson shout to transform into Captain Marvel?
